00023 #include "sysc/utils/sc_typeindex.h"
00024 
00025 namespace tlm {
00026 
00027 enum tlm_socket_category
00028 {
00029     TLM_UNKNOWN_SOCKET = 0,
00030     TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET = 0x1,
00031     TLM_TARGET_SOCKET = 0x2,
00032 
00033     TLM_MULTI_SOCKET = 0x10,
00034 
00035     TLM_MULTI_INITIATOR_SOCKET = TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET | TLM_MULTI_SOCKET,
00036     TLM_MULTI_TARGET_SOCKET = TLM_TARGET_SOCKET | TLM_MULTI_SOCKET
00037 };
00038 
00039 class tlm_base_socket_if
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base &         get_port_base() = 0;
00043   virtual sc_core::sc_port_base const &   get_port_base() const = 0;
00044   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base &       get_export_base() = 0;
00045   virtual sc_core::sc_export_base const & get_export_base() const = 0;
00046   virtual unsigned int                    get_bus_width() const = 0;
00047   virtual sc_core::sc_type_index          get_protocol_types() const = 0;
00048   virtual tlm_socket_category             get_socket_category() const = 0;
00049   
00050 protected:
00051   virtual ~tlm_base_socket_if() {}
00052 };
00053 
00054 } // namespace tlm
